text: Aftab Karma Singh Pureval (born September 9, 1982) is an American attorney and politician. He is the mayor of Cincinnati since 2022. On November 2, 2021 with 65.8% of the vote, he was elected as mayor making him the first Asian American to be elected as the mayor of Cincinnati. ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Lawyers from Cincinnati Category:Mayors of Cincinnati Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Aftab Pureval
